definitions.definition: The dividing line formed by combing the hair in different directions.
definitions.example: The part of his hair was slightly to the left.

definitions.definition: In the Hebrew lunisolar calendar, a unit of time equivalent to 3⅓ seconds.
A constituent of character or capacity; quality; faculty; talent; usually in the plural with a collective sense.
To cut hair with a parting; shed.
To be divided in two or separated; shed.
definitions.example: A rope parts.  His hair parts in the middle.

definitions.definition: To have a part or share; to partake.
To separate or disunite; to remove from contact or contiguity; to sunder.
To hold apart; to stand or intervene between.
To separate by a process of extraction, elimination, or secretion.

definitions.example: He was a man of great parts but little virtue.

definitions.definition: The genitals, short for private parts.
